00097 #if RKH_TRACE == 1
00098     #if RKH_EN_TRACE_STRING == 1 && ( RKH_EN_STATE_NAME != 1 || RKH_EN_HSM_NAME != 1 )
00099     #error  "rkhcfg.h, When enabling RKH_TRACE and RKH_EN_TRACE_STRING is set to one (1), must be set to one (1) both RKH_EN_STATE_NAME or RKH_EN_HSM_NAME"

00104 #error "rkhcfg.h, Missing RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH: Max. # of hierarchical levels"
00105 #else
00106     #if RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH == 0 || RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH > 8
00107     #error  "rkhcfg.h, RKH_MAX_HCAL_DEPTH must be > 0 and <= 8"
00108     #endif

00122  *  The following macros and constants are internal to RKH and 
00123  *  the user application should not call it.

00126 #define RKH_REGULAR                     0x80
00127 #define RKH_PSEUDO                      0
00128 #define RKH_TYPE(t,i)                   (t|i)
00129 
00130 #define RKH_BASIC                       RKH_TYPE( RKH_REGULAR,  0    )
00131 #define RKH_COMPOSITE                   RKH_TYPE( RKH_REGULAR,  0x01 )  
00132 #define RKH_CONDITIONAL                 RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x02 )  
00133 #define RKH_JUNCTION                    RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x04 )  
00134 #define RKH_SHISTORY                    RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x08 )  
00135 #define RKH_DHISTORY                    RKH_TYPE( RKH_PSEUDO,   0x10 )

00254 #if RKH_EN_ENT_HSM_ARG == 1
00255     
00256     typedef void ( *RKHENT_T )( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00257 
00258     #define rkh_exec_entry( s, h )              \
00259     {                                           \
00260         if( (s)->enter != NULL )                \
00261             (*(s)->enter)( h );                 \
00262     }
00263 
00264 #else
00265     
00266     typedef void ( *RKHENT_T )( void );
00267 
00268     #define rkh_exec_entry( s, h )              \
00269     {                                           \
00270         if( (s)->enter != NULL )                \
00271             (*(s)->enter)();                    \
00272     }
00273 
00274 #endif

00294     {                                           \

00296             (*(s)->exit)( h );                  \
00297     }

00369 #if RKH_EN_ACT_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_ACT_HSM_ARG == 1
00370 
00371     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph, RKHEVT_T *pe );
00372     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))( h, e )
00373 
00374 #elif RKH_EN_ACT_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_ACT_HSM_ARG == 0
00375     
00376     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( RKHEVT_T *pe );
00377     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))( e )
00378 
00379 #elif RKH_EN_ACT_EVT_ARG == 0 && RKH_EN_ACT_HSM_ARG == 1
00380     
00381     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00382     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))( h )
00383 
00384 #else
00385     
00386     typedef void (*RKHACT_T)( void );
00387     #define rkh_call_action(h,e)    (*CA( q ))()
00388 
00389 #endif

00412 #if RKH_EN_GRD_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_GRD_HSM_ARG == 1
00413 
00414     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph, RKHEVT_T *pe );
00415     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)( h, e )
00416     HUInt rkh_else( const struct rkh_t *ph, RKHEVT_T *pe );
00417 
00418 #elif RKH_EN_GRD_EVT_ARG == 1 && RKH_EN_GRD_HSM_ARG == 0
00419     
00420     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( RKHEVT_T *pe );
00421     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)( e )
00422     HUInt rkh_else( RKHEVT_T *pe );
00423 
00424 
00425 #elif RKH_EN_GRD_EVT_ARG == 0 && RKH_EN_GRD_HSM_ARG == 1
00426     
00427     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00428     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)( h )
00429     HUInt rkh_else( const struct rkh_t *ph );
00430 
00431 #else
00432     
00433     typedef HUInt (*RKHGUARD_T)( void );
00434     #define rkh_call_guard(t,h,e)   (*(t)->guard)()
00435     HUInt rkh_else( void );
00436 
00437 #endif
